name: 昔:Yesterday
description: It's a 3D Puzzle Game talking about the philosophy of love and encounter from female's perspective. All we experienced in countless “yesterday” make us be ourselves today. Beautiful visual performance and intriguing music immerse players in this fantasy world soon, where dreams mix with reality, time and space interweave together.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7/8/10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVDIA GTX480 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
